verse.name: v1
verse.lines: There is a name I love to hear, I love to sing its worth; It sounds like music in my ear, The sweetest name on earth.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Oh, how I love Jesus, Oh, how I love Jesus, Oh, how I love Jesus, Because He first loved me!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: It tells me of a Savior’s love, Who died to set me free; It tells me of His precious blood, The sinner’s perfect plea.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: It tells what my Father hath In store for ev'ry day, And tho' I tread a darksome path, Yields sunshine all the way.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: It tells of One whose loving heart Can feel my deepest woe, Who in each sorrow bears a part, That none can bear below.
